name: TOWERGLASS
description:
Time is broken... 

The Forgotten Towers have emerged again from the sand...

They are waiting for you...

Combine your spells and the power to manipulate time in order to solve the puzzles that lie at the heart of the towers!

Towerglass is the first game we made in Aftermind, developed as a university project in around 3 and a half months. The tools used were Unity, Tiled Map Editor and Photoshop.
